channel.title: Tooling on juri.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Tooling on juri.dev

item.title: Create Code Snippets for Visual Studio Code with ease
item.description: When writing software, even when writing a blog post using Markdown, there are some pieces you have to write again and again. Either you’re lazy or you don’t remember the exact syntax, code snippets can really help here. Let’s see how.

item.title: Setup your Workstation for JavaScript Development
item.description: You want to learn about modern web development with JavaScript? Maybe Angular? Well, then it’s time to get you setup properly to get started. In this article we’ll go through some of the tools.

item.title: Setting up my Developer Machine
item.description: Developers need to have fast machines! Today I just returned from a week of holidays at Kos (Greece). Amazing! So you might imagine that returning to work is usually less pleasant ;), but that changed when I opened Outlook and saw the email from our systems department that my new developer machine setup was ready.

item.title: Best practices: Tracking information on the source code with Visual Studio and TFS
item.description: An issue in managing a code base is not only to guide different developers through the development process, preventing that they overwrite each others modifications on the source code (which would for sure happen when just sharing the code files over the normal file system.
